events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit me at all. I want to know how I can get a refund for it.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund issue related to product return and money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who handles refund requests in customer service.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I see you'd like to return your jacket for a refund. I'm here to help you through the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the refund?
Yes, the jacket is unused and still in the box. My order number is 7683921. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the info. Please ship the jacket back to the address provided in the return label we will email you shortly. Once received, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for the clear instructions. I'll wait for the return label email and send the jacket back soon.
I’ve sent the return label to your email address. Feel free to reach out if you need any help with the return shipment.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday and received the tracking number. Thanks again for your help!
We have confirmed receipt of your return shipment and processed your refund today. The amount should reflect in your account in 2–3 business days.
We hope you received your refund successfully. Please contact us if there are any issues or further questions.
We would appreciate if you could take a short survey regarding your refund experience to help us improve our service.
Since there has been no further contact, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for choosing our service.
